Prospect.title: Prospect
Prospect.description: Represents a potential customer or lead in the CRM system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Prospect entity.

source.description: Source from which the prospect originated (e.g., Web, Referral, Trade Show).

leadScore.description: Score indicating the prospect's likelihood of becoming a customer (AI Powered).

status.description: Current stage of the prospect in the sales funnel.

value.description: The monetary value of the potential deal.

lastContact.description: The date of the last contact with the prospect.

interactionHistory.description: A log of all interactions with the prospect.

Stage.title: Stage
Stage.description: Represents a stage in the sales funnel.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Stage entity.

name.description: Name of the stage (e.g., Qualified, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost).

order.description: The order in which the stage appears in the funnel. Lower numbers appear first.

Report.title: Report
Report.description: Stores a sales report for the sales team.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Report entity.

dateCreated.description: The date that the report was created.

definition.description: Stores prospect data for a specific user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The ID of the user who owns the prospect.

params.name: prospectId
params.description: The unique ID of the prospect.

definition.description: Stores the sales funnel stages for a specific user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The ID of the user who owns the stage.

params.name: stageId
params.description: The unique ID of the stage.

definition.description: Stores sales reports for a specific user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The ID of the user who owns the report.

params.name: reportId
params.description: The unique ID of the report.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support the OtiCRM application, focusing on prospects, sales stages, and reports. User-specific data is stored under `/users/{userId}` for data privacy and ownership. This structure supports the required features: dashboard overview, sales funnel management, prospect tracking, and reporting and analytics.
